oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Plant a victory garden
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This colorful poster from World War II shows a man and woman working in a garden with a young boy collecting a variety of produce in a basket. At the bottom of the poster are messages that read ""Our Food is Fighting"" and ""A Garden Will Make Your Rations Go Further"".
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: World War I and World War II Poster Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: World War, 1939-1945; Rationing-- United States; Victory Gardens; Posters
